briefdescription.para: Channel banner (boost level locked)

detaileddescription.para: the bitrate (in bits) of the voice channel
Guild id of the guild that owns the channel

briefdescription.para: Channel icon (for group DMs)
Unique ID of object set by Discord. This value contains a timestamp, worker ID, internal server ID, and an incrementing value. Only the timestamp is relevant to us as useful metadata.

detaileddescription.para: ID of last message to be sent to the channel
User ID of owner for group DMs
Permission overwrites to apply to base permissions

briefdescription.para: This is only filled when the channel is part of the resolved set sent within an interaction. Any other time it contains zero. When filled, it contains the calculated permission bitmask of the user issuing the command within this channel.

detaileddescription.para: Sorting position, lower number means higher up the list
amount of seconds a user has to wait before sending another message (0-21600); bots, as well as users with the permission manage_messages or manage_channel, are unaffected

briefdescription.para: Voice region if set for voice channel, otherwise empty string.

detaileddescription.para: Maximum user limit for voice channels (0-99)

briefdescription.para: Add (bitwise OR) a flag to this channel object.

simplesect.para: Reference to self, so these method calls may be chained

memberdef.argsstring: (const snowflake id, const uint8_t type, const uint64_t allowed_permissions, const uint64_t denied_permissions)
memberdef.name: add_permission_overwrite

briefdescription.para: Add a permission_overwrite to this channel object.

parameterdescription.para: ID of the role or the member you want to add overwrite for
type of overwrite (0 for role, 1 for member)
bitmask of allowed permissions (refer to enum role_permissions) for this user/role in this channel
bitmask of denied permissions (refer to enum role_permissions) for this user/role in this channel

simplesect.para: Reference to self, so these method calls may be chained

briefdescription.para: Build json for this channel object.

parameterdescription.para: include the ID in the json

simplesect.para: std::string JSON string

detaileddescription.para:
Read class values from json object
j
A json object to read from
A reference to self

briefdescription.para: Get the channel's banner url if they have one, otherwise returns an empty string.

parameterdescription.para: The size of the banner in pixels. It can be any power of two between 16 and 4096. if not specified, the default sized banner is returned.

simplesect.para: std::string banner url or empty string

briefdescription.para: Get the creation time of this object according to Discord.

simplesect.para: double creation time inferred from the snowflake ID. The minimum possible value is the first second of 2015.

briefdescription.para: Get the channel's icon url (if its a group DM), otherwise returns an empty string.

parameterdescription.para: The size of the icon in pixels. It can be any power of two between 16 and 4096. if not specified, the default sized icon is returned.

simplesect.para: std::string icon url or empty string

briefdescription.para: Return a map of members on the channel, built from the guild's member list based on which members have the VIEW_CHANNEL permission. Does not return reliable information for voice channels, use dpp::channel::get_voice_members() instead for this.

simplesect.para: A map of guild members keyed by user id.

briefdescription.para: Get the mention ping for the channel.

simplesect.para: std::string mention

briefdescription.para: Get the user permissions for a user on this channel.

parameterdescription.para: The user to return permissions for

simplesect.para: uint64_t Permissions bitmask made of bits in role_permissions. Note that if the user is not on the channel or the guild is not in the cache, the function will always return 0.

briefdescription.para: Get a map of members in this channel, if it is a voice channel. The map is keyed by snowflake id of the user.

simplesect.para: std::map<snowflake, voicestate> The voice members of the channel

briefdescription.para: Returns true if the channel is a category.

simplesect.para: true if a category

briefdescription.para: Returns true if the channel is a DM.

simplesect.para: true if is a DM

briefdescription.para: Returns true if the channel is a group DM channel.

simplesect.para: true if group DM

briefdescription.para: Returns true if the channel is a news channel.

simplesect.para: true if news channel

briefdescription.para: Returns true if the channel is NSFW gated.

simplesect.para: true if NSFW

briefdescription.para: Returns true if the channel is a stage channel.

simplesect.para: true if stage channel

briefdescription.para: Returns true if the channel is a store channel.

simplesect.para: true if store channel

briefdescription.para: Returns true if the channel is a text channel.

simplesect.para: true if text channel

briefdescription.para: Returns true if video quality is 720p.

simplesect.para: true if video quality is 720p

briefdescription.para: Returns true if video quality is auto.

simplesect.para: true if video quality is auto

briefdescription.para: Returns true if the channel is a voice channel.

simplesect.para: true if voice channel

briefdescription.para: Remove (bitwise NOT AND) a flag from this channel object.

simplesect.para: Reference to self, so these method calls may be chained

briefdescription.para: Set bitrate of this channel object.

simplesect.para: Reference to self, so these method calls may be chained

briefdescription.para: Set flags for this channel object.

simplesect.para: Reference to self, so these method calls may be chained

briefdescription.para: Set name of this channel object.

simplesect.para: Reference to self, so these method calls may be chained
name will be truncated to 100 chars, if longer

briefdescription.para: Set nsfw property of this channel object.

simplesect.para: Reference to self, so these method calls may be chained

briefdescription.para: Set parent_id of this channel object.

simplesect.para: Reference to self, so these method calls may be chained

briefdescription.para: Set position of this channel object.

simplesect.para: Reference to self, so these method calls may be chained

briefdescription.para: Set rate_limit_per_user of this channel object.

simplesect.para: Reference to self, so these method calls may be chained

briefdescription.para: Set topic of this channel object.

simplesect.para: Reference to self, so these method calls may be chained
topic will be truncated to 1024 chars, if longer

briefdescription.para: Set user_limit of this channel object.

simplesect.para: Reference to self, so these method calls may be chained

briefdescription.para: A definition of a discord channel There are one of these for every channel type except threads. Threads are special snowflakes. Get it? A Discord pun. Hahaha. .... I'll get my coat.
